summary: The 'Women and Lung Cancer Research and Preventive Services Act of 2025' directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a comprehensive review. This review will evaluate the current state of lung cancer research in women and underserved populations, identify opportunities for accelerating research, expand access to preventive services, and develop public awareness campaigns.  The Secretary, in consultation with other agencies, will submit a report to Congress within two years of the Act's enactment, detailing findings and recommendations.
